definition[1]: a woman employed to look after a young child
definition[2]: to look after someone who is ill or injured

example[9]: She spent several years nursing in a military hospital.
definition[4]: to rest when you have an illness or injury so that it will get better

definition[5]: if a woman nurses a baby, she feeds it with milk from her breasts

definition[6]: if a baby nurses, it sucks milk from its mother’s breast
definition[7]: to keep a feeling or idea in your mind for a long time, especially an angry feeling

definition[8]: to take special care of something, especially during a difficult situation

definition[9]: if you nurse a drink, especially an alcoholic one, you drink it very slowly
example[14]: Oliver sat at the bar, nursing a bottle of beer.
definition[10]: to hold something carefully in your hands or arms close to your body
